page.title: 11Welshampton C.E. School.
page.content: The school is 135 years old. There are 44 children at school now and when they leave most of them go to Lakelands.The Juniors are in one room and the infants are in the other.Mums and Toddlers on Tuesday and playgroup on Thursday,both in the afternoon,are held in school.The Parish Council and the P.C.C. have their meetings there too.There is a P.T.A. to pay for trips and to buy things for us.We have a good playing field for cricket, football,rounders and there is a sandpit as well.The school is made of sandstone,bricks and wood with slates on the roof.The school is heated by electric storage heaters. There are three teachers at the school. Some children walk,some cycle,some travel by car or come to school by mini bus.Dinners arrive from Ellesmere
